name: ListApplicationKeys
description:
Retrieve all application keys for your organization.

This tool calls the Datadog API to list all application keys available for your organization, allowing you to view and manage your organization's credentials.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Specify the number of application keys to return per page. Maximum is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number to return in the results.

parameters.name: sort_keys_by_attribute
parameters.description: Sort application keys by attribute such as 'created_at', 'name', or 'last4'. Use a minus sign for descending order, e.g., '-name'.

value_schema.description:
Application key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

parameters.name: filter_application_keys
parameters.description: Filter the application keys based on a specified string to narrow down the results.

value_schema.description: Filter application keys by the specified string.

parameters.name: created_after_date
parameters.description: Include application keys created on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: created_before_date
parameters.description: Filters application keys created on or before this date. Expected format is YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or before the specified date.

parameters.name: include_related_resource
parameters.description: Specify 'owned_by' to include related resource information in the response.

value_schema.description: Resource path for related resources to include in the response. Only `owned_by` is supported.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Application key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

value_schema.description:
Application key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter application keys by the specified string.

value_schema.description: Filter application keys by the specified string.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][start]
parameters.description: Only include application keys created on or after the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][end]
parameters.description: Only include application keys created on or before the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or before the specified date.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Resource path for related resources to include in the response. Only `owned_by` is supported.

value_schema.description: Resource path for related resources to include in the response. Only `owned_by` is supported.
